properties.name: hm.security.basic.enabled
properties.description: (optional) enable html basic auth or not.

properties.name: hm.bcrypt.strength
properties.description: (optional) Log rounds in BCrypt which encrypt and match user password.

properties.name: hm.ssl.check
properties.description: (optional) whether use ssl check in restTemplate.

properties.name: hm.agent.notifier.secret
properties.description: (optional) The secret for agent to auth.

properties.name: hm.fbstorage.location
properties.description: (optional) Data location for file base storage.
